parameters.name: DedicatedHostClusterIds
parameters.description: The list of host group IDs. The value can be a JSON array consisting of multiple IDs in the `["dc-xxxxxxxxx", "dc-yyyyyyyyy",..., "dc-zzzzzzzzz"]` format. Separate the IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: DedicatedHostClusterName
parameters.description: The name of the host group.

parameters.name: LockReason
parameters.description: >  This parameter is unavailable for use.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Valid values: 1 to 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the host group. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The resource group ID of the host group. You can use a resource group ID to filter no more than 1,000 host groups.

>  A default resource group is not supported.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: >  This parameter is unavailable for use.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the host group.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID of the host group. You can call the [DescribeZones](~~25610~~) operation to query the most recent zone list.
